meanings.definition: A type of wooden siding used on buildings.
meanings.sent1: The old house had beautiful weatherboarding that added charm to its appearance.
meanings.sent2: The weatherboarding on the house protected it from the rain and wind.
meanings.sent3: The weatherboarding on the building whispered secrets to the passing clouds.
meanings.sent4: The weatherboarding stood strong like a loyal guardian around the house.
meanings.sent5: The weatherboarding gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its natural beauty.

meanings.definition: To cover a building with weatherboarding.
meanings.sent1: The carpenters will weatherboard the entire house next week.
meanings.sent2: We decided to weatherboard the cabin for better insulation.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally weatherboarded the shed upside down, creating a quirky look.
meanings.sent4: She weatherboarded the barn with precision, ensuring it would withstand any storm.
meanings.sent5: The team worked together to weatherboard the school, making it more durable.
